translation.en: The future of artificial intelligence, and it all started with this.
translation.zh: ‎人工智能的未来 全都从这里开始

translation.en: [Mr. Short] Ah, Alfred. Hmm.
Hang on. Innovation, seven?
For the King Croc sub aqua drone? I mean,
translation.zh: ‎鳄鱼王水下无人机吗？我是说…

translation.en: this thing completely changed the face of deep-sea rescue.
translation.zh: ‎这东西完全革新了深海救援

translation.en: There's some frankly offensive inaccuracies.
translation.zh: ‎这里绝对有非常侮辱人的不准确

translation.en: They should let us write the stats.
That'd be so cool, and way more accurate.
translation.zh: ‎那样就太好了 会比现在准确得多

translation.en: Nas, I heard a little rumor going around the message boards that--
translation.zh:
‎纳斯 我听说在线论坛上
‎有一个小道消息…

translation.en: Well, hear me out. Whatever he's launching, today, right,
translation.zh:
‎你先听我说完
‎不管他今天要发布什么 好嘛

translation.en: is gonna make every single one of these obsolete.
We're talking straight tens.
It's just gossip. I know you don't like to listen to that…
translation.zh:
‎只是小道消息
‎我知道你不喜欢听这个 但是…

translation.en: No, course not.
-But what if it's true? -Right.
I mean, after this trip, the world may never be the same again.
translation.zh:
‎我是说 这一趟旅行之后
‎世界可能就大变样了

translation.en: Bus can't get here quick enough.
Literally. It's five minutes late.
translation.zh: ‎真的 已经迟到五分钟了

translation.en: Oh, Mindy.
-Intelligence, zero? That's ridiculous. -What?
Lucky for him, I've got the reflexes of a cat that can drive.
translation.zh:
‎对它来说幸运的是
‎我有猫的反应能力 可以开车

translation.en: What's he doing out in the daytime? Something must be wrong.
translation.zh:
‎他大白天在外面做什么？
‎一定出了什么问题

translation.en: Sophie, he's a spiky ball. Nothing's hurting him.
translation.zh:
‎索菲 他是个小刺球
‎什么都不会伤害他的

translation.en: Get him in the car.
-Sure you won't get in trubbs? -We've talked about "trubbs,"
translation.zh:
‎-确定你不会惹上麻烦吗？
‎-我们聊过“麻烦”

translation.en: and I think I've earned a bit of credit with an emergency stop like that.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得这样的紧急停车
‎能让我赢得一点夸奖

translation.en: Right, Jeff?
I think he's dehydrated. We need some water.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他脱水了 我们需要水

translation.en: How can you tell? Not like he has a range of expressions.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道？它又没有情绪表达

translation.en: He literally has one, "I'm a hedgehog."
Misha, your lesson was only booked till 8, so I'd appreciate it--
translation.zh:
‎米莎 你的课只订到了八点
‎所以我会很感激你…

translation.en: No backseat driving please, Jeff. I'm trying to concentrate.
translation.zh:
‎别在后座指挥 谢谢 杰夫
‎我正在努力集中

translation.en: -The bus leaves at 8, right? -I think so?
translation.zh:
‎-校巴八点离开 对吧？
‎-应该吧？

translation.en: Yeah. Loads of time.
[Sophie] Careful, you're scaring him.
translation.zh: ‎小心点 米莎 你吓到他了

translation.en: I'm not scared.
-I find it a bit difficult to work-- -Not everything's about you, Jeff.
translation.zh:
‎-我感觉有点难工作…
‎-不是什么事都以你为中心 杰夫

translation.en: We have three minutes to catch the bus.
translation.zh: ‎我们有三分钟时间赶上校巴

translation.en: We can either be careful or we can be quick.
-I vote careful. -I vote quick.
Overruled, Jeff.
[woman] Can't talk, babe.
No, I'm driving.
Yeah, he's got a science trip.
translation.zh: ‎是的 他有一个科学之旅

translation.en: You know that fella with the robots?
translation.zh: ‎你知道那个搞机器人的家伙吗？

translation.en: Yeah, he's into all of that, apparently.
Oh, I know. Oh, it's tragic.
No, look I really can't talk.
Get out! She didn't!
Hi, Danny.
Hello, Tom's mom.
Daniel, I keep telling you, you can call me Julie.
translation.zh:
‎丹尼尔 我一直告诉你
‎你可以叫我朱莉

translation.en: -Hi, Julie. -So, off to look at some robots, are you?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 朱莉
‎-你要去看机器人吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a day off school, innit?
translation.zh: ‎对 今天学校放假 对吧？

translation.en: Well, you enjoy yourself.
-Don't do anything I wouldn't do. -All right.
Ha! See that?
Hey, Mom, see you later, yeah? Maybe after--
translation.zh: ‎嗨 妈妈 回头见 好吗？也许之后…

translation.en: Hey.
-She's all right, your mom. -Yes, okay, man.
Skelly, don't you think Tom's mom's all right?
translation.zh:
‎斯凯利
‎你不觉得汤姆的妈妈挺好的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, she's more than all right, Tom.
translation.zh: ‎对 她不只是挺好的 汤姆

translation.en: Come on.
Grab it!
Pass it.
♪ That hat is mine I wear it all the time ♪
translation.zh: ‎那个帽子是我的 我一直戴着

translation.en: ♪ You think that you're cool But you look like a fool, let's go! ♪
translation.zh:
‎觉得你挺帅
‎但你看起来有点衰 我们走！

translation.en: ♪ So, try it on I bet you look the bomb ♪
translation.zh: ‎那就试试 你一定看起来不错

translation.en: ♪ If you make me late to class I'll stick this hat right up your-- ♪
translation.zh:
‎如果你让我上课迟到
‎我就把这顶帽子塞进你的…

translation.en: Enough.
-Please go. It's far too early for improv. -[playful music plays]
translation.zh: ‎快走吧 现在即兴表演太早了

translation.en: -Love you, Daddy. -I love you, Bethan.
translation.zh:
‎-爱你 爸爸
‎-我爱你 贝斯安

translation.en: -Love you, Mr. Conner! -Get out of my van, Joshua.
translation.zh:
‎-爱你 康纳先生！
‎-滚出我的车 乔什

translation.en: Yo, wait up.
-So, I shall see you back here. -Ten o'clock on the dot.
-Be on time… -You'll be fine.
-You'll do great… -If you're not late.
-Don't forget. -I love you,
but all this rhyming is gonna throw off my schedule.
translation.zh: ‎但这些押韵会影响我的日程

translation.en: -Have fun, darling. -Bye.
[laughs] Anti-gravity?
Cellular regeneration?
Nanotech? He's Dalton Monkhouse, what's he gonna do next?
translation.zh:
‎纳米技术？他是道尔顿·蒙克豪斯
‎他接下来会做什么？

translation.en: Good morning, sir. How are we, today?
translation.zh: ‎早上好 先生 我们今天怎么样？

translation.en: Honestly, Chelsea, not great.
translation.zh: ‎老实说 切尔茜 不太好

translation.en: Still on your brother-in-law's sofa?
The bus hasn't shown up yet.
Wait, hang on. How'd you know about that?
Hey there. I hope you're having a lovely morning.
translation.zh: ‎喂 希望你今天早上过得愉快

translation.en: I am, thank you.
Listen, I hate to be a pain, but I'm calling from Braelawn Academy.
translation.zh:
‎听我说 我不想讨人厌
‎但我是从布瑞劳恩学校打来的电话

translation.en: Yeah. Not yet.
Okay. Just around the corner?
So, it'll only be 25 minutes late.
How old am I?
Old enough to know I'll be expecting a sizable discount on the invoice.
translation.zh:
‎足够大到知道
‎可以指望发票给一个客观的折扣

translation.en: You take care.
One minute late!
And that is basically early.
Cheers, Jeff. Reckon I'm ready for my test, yeah?
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 杰夫
‎觉得我准备好考试了 对吧？

translation.en: [Mr. Short] Right, here they come.
translation.zh: ‎对 切尔茜 他们来了

translation.en: Nice and slow, please. No, don't push.
translation.zh: ‎请慢一点 不行 不要推

translation.en: Excuse me, can we please just get on the bus…
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我们可以上车吗？

translation.en: Steps do not compute.
Ow, my robo-shins.
Get on the bus, please, Josh.
Guys… Excuse me, guys.
translation.zh: ‎各位 不好意思 各位

translation.en: Please be careful.
Make your way up to the left. If there's no space, go upstairs.
translation.zh:
‎往左边走
‎如果没有空间 就上楼去

translation.en: Kiss!
-I'm sorry, sir. -It's all right.
I'm not great with long journeys myself.
Try and visualize an ocean, that's what I do.
translation.zh: ‎试着想象一下海洋 我是这样做的

translation.en: Just a calm ocean.
Oh no, that's--
Oh, dear.
Can I just borrow that a sec?
[Chelsea] Okay, guys.
Guys!
In order to stop you being bored,
I have curated and printed off some brochures for your perusal.
translation.zh: ‎我策划并打印了一些小册子给你们读

translation.en: No big deal, I was only up till 2.
translation.zh: ‎不算什么 我只熬到了两点

translation.en: You'll find a map of the Green Arena,
translation.zh: ‎你们会看到绿色天地的地图

translation.en: some fun trivia about Monkhouse Dynamics and the winning essay,
translation.zh:
‎蒙克豪斯动力公司的一些有趣冷知识
‎还有获奖论文

translation.en: handpicked by Dalton Monkhouse himself,
translation.zh: ‎由道尔顿·蒙克豪斯亲自筛选

translation.en: and the reason we get to attend such a prestigious event.
translation.zh: ‎以及我们能参加如有威望活动的原因

translation.en: Round of applause for Nas.
So, Nas, you're a Dalton Monkhouse stan, is that fair to say?
translation.zh:
‎所以 纳斯 你是道尔顿·蒙克豪斯的
‎粉丝 可以这样说吗？

translation.en: That is fair to say, Chelsea. Yes.
translation.zh: ‎可以这样说 切尔茜 是的

translation.en: What can you tell us about him?
-Here we go. -Tell me when it's over.
Okay, so Dalton Monkhouse is the founder of Monkhouse Dynamics.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 所以道尔顿·蒙克豪斯
‎是蒙克豪斯动力公司的创始人

translation.en: He's a multi-billionaire, a renowned environmentalist,
translation.zh: ‎他是个亿万富翁 著名的环保主义者

translation.en: a designer and engineer of next gen robotics.
translation.zh: ‎设计师、下一代机器人工程师

translation.en: He's also the only three-time recipient of the International Science Award.
translation.zh:
‎他也是唯一获得过三次
‎国际科学奖的人

translation.en: He's basically the coolest guy on the planet.
translation.zh: ‎他基本上是这个星球上最酷的人

translation.en: It's all in the essay.
Gimme that.
"My name is Nas."
"Read my love letter to Dr. Monkhouse in this handy brochure."
translation.zh:
‎“读读我在这个方便手册中
‎给蒙克豪斯博士的情书”

translation.en: Actually, it's not.
It's not a love letter, it's actually a thesis
on the intrinsically disordered tardigrade proteins
translation.zh: ‎讲内在无序的缓步动物蛋白

translation.en: and their potential biostasis applications.
translation.zh: ‎以及它可能的生物停滞应用

translation.en: That sounds amazing.
Really? You should give it a read.
Don't worry. I tried to make it as accessible to the layperson as I could.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 我努力试着
‎尽量让外行人能看懂了

translation.en: What did you call me?
Why don't you just leave him alone, Danny?
Everyone, listen up, yeah.
Misha's mate has got something to say.
Go on, Misha's mate.
Not the first time you couldn't get a girl to talk to you, eh? Daniel.
translation.zh:
‎这不是你第一次
‎让女孩不跟你说话 对吧？丹尼尔

translation.en: How are things with Sarah?
Oh, yeah. That's right.
She dumped you.
She got tired of holding her nose.
Apparently, it's not only your personality that stinks.
translation.zh: ‎显然恶臭的不只是你的个性

translation.en: I got this for you.
Oh. You can keep that. I won't be needing it.
translation.zh: ‎你可以留着 我不需要了

translation.en: Which is, coincidentally, exactly what Sarah said about you.
translation.zh: ‎巧合的是 这正是莎拉形容你的话

translation.en: Start on her again
and I'll say way worse.
Okay, that's enough. Everyone settle down.
translation.zh: ‎行了 够了 所有人安静下来

translation.en: We'll be there in a minute. Stop throwing.
translation.zh: ‎我们马上就到了 别再扔了

translation.en: -Mate, don't even worry about it, she's-- -Shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-朋友 你不用担心 她…
‎-闭嘴

translation.en: Where's that bra gone?
[Misha] Forget about him.
-What'll we do about--? -Spikelangelo?
Oh, no, you named him.
translation.zh: ‎哦 不 是你给他取的名字

translation.en: We've got a baby to look after now.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在有个宝宝要照顾了

translation.en: -And you love him. -I wouldn't go that far.
-Give him a kiss. -Oh, no. Hey!
No!
-Yeah, he's not in there. -What?
Oh, my gosh. I'm a terrible parent.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我是个糟糕的家长

translation.en: Okay, just wait. Because we're running a little bit late…
translation.zh: ‎好 等一下 因为我们有点晚了…

translation.en: I know. For the last leg of our journey, we're gonna be traveling in style.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 我们旅程的最后一个休息站
‎我们要时尚旅行

translation.en: No offense.
So everyone off!
One at a time. Off you get. Slowly.
translation.zh: ‎一个一个来 下车 慢点

translation.en: Yeah, one at a time. Don't… Yes. Give me some…
translation.zh:
‎对 一个一个来 别…
‎对 给我一点…

translation.en: Elbow in the face. Thank you.
Yes!
Found my lunch.
I'm sorry if there's some sick on the seat.
translation.zh: ‎座位上有呕吐物 我很抱歉

translation.en: How about that?
What do you think, Tom?
-It's all right, sir. -Yeah.
Danny? What do you think of that?
Did you know… Excuse me!
…Dalton Monkhouse built his first domestic robot when he was only nine years old?
translation.zh:
‎道尔顿·蒙克豪斯九岁的时候
‎就建造了他的第一个动力机器人？

translation.en: -Anyone tell me what it was called? -Alfred!
translation.zh:
‎-谁告诉我它叫什么？
‎-阿尔弗雷德！

translation.en: Nice one, Nas.
Okay, what about the robot called Percy? What did that one do?
translation.zh:
‎好 那个叫波希的机器人呢？
‎那个是做什么的？

translation.en: It was a gardener! To help his mom plant the daffodils.
Well done again, Nas. Maybe let someone else have a go. Just…
translation.zh:
‎又答对了 纳斯
‎或许可以让别人试试 让…

translation.en: give people a chance. Okay, what about this one?
translation.zh: ‎别人也有机会 好 那这个呢？

translation.en: What did Monkhouse call his revolutionary AI network
translation.zh:
‎蒙克豪斯革命性的人工智能网络
‎在今年的绿色现场

translation.en: that allowed 75 drones
translation.zh: ‎演唱会上 允许75架无人机

translation.en: to perform a synchronized light show at this year's Green Live concert?
translation.zh:
‎同步表演灯光秀
‎蒙克豪斯怎么称呼这个网络？

translation.en: -Family-- -No, sorry, Nas. Anyone else?
translation.zh:
‎-家庭…
‎-不对 抱歉 纳斯 还有别人吗？

translation.en: Kin Chip.
He called it the Kin Chip Network.
Get Tom doing the reading.
Right you are, mate. Can I get a bump?
translation.zh: ‎你说得对 朋友 能碰一下拳吗？

translation.en: I was gonna say Kin Chip. I was gonna say that.
translation.zh:
‎我本来想说亲芯芯片的
‎我本来想说的

translation.en: It's okay not to know everything, champ. Nobody does.
translation.zh: ‎你不用无所不知 冠军 没有人能做到

translation.en: Hi, I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是道尔顿·蒙克豪斯

translation.en: Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到绿色天地 欢迎来到未来！

translation.en: Hand your phones in. You'll get them back after the presentation.
translation.zh:
‎上交你们的手机
‎展示之后再还给你们

translation.en: [Monkhouse hologram] I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是道尔顿·蒙克豪斯

translation.en: Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到绿色天地 欢迎来到未来！

translation.en: So Nas doesn't know everything.
Least I know more than you.
Don't know more than Tom, though, do you?
translation.zh: ‎不过没有汤姆知道的多 是吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
You hear that, Tom? Gonna let him chat like that about you?
translation.zh:
‎听到了吗 汤姆？
‎要让他那样说你吗？

translation.en: -I'm not bothered, mate. -No.
I wouldn't have that, you know?
You can't let him do that. You've gotta do something.
translation.zh:
‎你不能让他那样做
‎你得做点什么

translation.en: Bro.
You can't let him do that, bro.
translation.zh: ‎你不能让他那样做 兄弟

translation.en: Hey, that's my stuff!
Watch your mouth, yeah?
Pro tip from someone who's been there.
translation.zh: ‎经历过的人给你的专业建议

translation.en: Not everyone shares your enthusiasm for this stuff.
translation.zh:
‎不是每个人
‎都像你一样喜欢这种东西

translation.en: -So, maybe dial it down a bit. -Dial "it" down?
translation.zh:
‎-所以也许可以稍微调低一点
‎-低调一点？

translation.en: What's "it"?
You know, your interests and passions.
The things that make me me?
Kind of?
"Sophie Roman. Sisterly advice, zero."
translation.zh: ‎“索菲·罗曼 姐姐建议 零分”

translation.en: -Hey, Mom told me to look out for you. -I don't need looking out for!
translation.zh:
‎-喂 妈妈叫我照顾你
‎-我不需要照顾！

translation.en: How'd that go? Good? 'Cause we've got a hedgehog to liberate.
translation.zh:
‎怎么样？好吗？
‎因为我们有一只刺猬要解放

translation.en: [Monkhouse hologram] Hi, I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是道尔顿·蒙克豪斯

translation.en: Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到绿色天地 欢迎来到未来！

translation.en: This is only the beginning.
Tomorrow will be better, believe me.
-He's gonna get himself in trubbs. -Please stop saying "trubbs."
translation.zh:
‎-他会把自己卷进麻烦里
‎-拜托你别再说“麻烦”了

translation.en: New plan. You get Nas, I'll take care of Spikelangelo.
translation.zh:
‎新计划 你去找纳斯
‎我来照顾刺开朗基罗

translation.en: [whispering] Nas?
Nas?
Careful out there.
I swear, if you give me fleas, I will punt you over that hedge.
translation.zh:
‎我发誓 如果你让我染上跳蚤
‎我会把你踢飞 越过那个篱笆

translation.en: Enjoy paradise, son.
You lost one?
-He lost one. -Technically, it lost itself.
translation.zh:
‎-他弄丢了一个
‎-理论上是它自己丢的

translation.en: -You dropped it on the floor-- -Would you shut… Just shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-你把它掉在地上了…
‎-你能不能闭嘴… 别说了

translation.en: [stage manager] Two minutes. All stage crews to positions.
translation.zh:
‎两分钟 各位
‎所有舞台人员就位

translation.en: Just… get to positions.
We are not messing up the life's work of Dalton Monkhouse
translation.zh:
‎我们不能毁掉道尔顿·蒙克豪斯
‎毕生的事业

translation.en: while the world is watching, okay?
translation.zh: ‎而且整个世界都看着呢 好吗？

translation.en: [stage manager] One minute, everyone. Heroes on stage.
translation.zh: ‎一分钟 各位 英雄上台

translation.en: Last looks, see you on the other side.
[whispering] Nas?
Nas?
[event narrator] The world can be a dark place,
translation.zh: ‎世界有时候是个很黑暗的地方

translation.en: but one man can bring the light.
That man's name is
Dalton Monkhouse.
Thank you.
Thank… No, thank you.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
And I am so sorry that I cannot be there with you in person today,
translation.zh: ‎我很抱歉今天不能亲自到场陪同

translation.en: but I am with you all in digital spirit.
translation.zh:
‎但我在数字精神中
‎陪伴着你们所有人

translation.en: That's right, thanks to Monkhouse Dynamics' Holo-sapiens technology,
translation.zh:
‎没错 感谢蒙克豪斯动力公司的
‎全息人像技术

translation.en: I have finally achieved omnipresence.
Hello, Rio.
Hello, Tokyo.
Hello, Mumbai.
Hello, humanity.
And hello, planet Earth.
Beautiful, isn't she?
Well,
take a good look, because it might be your last.
translation.zh:
‎好好看一眼
‎因为这可能是你们最后一眼了

translation.en: What?
The world is doomed?
But we all use paper straws instead of plastic in our milkshakes now.
translation.zh:
‎但我们现在喝奶昔
‎都用纸吸管代替塑料了

translation.en: Is that not enough?
Ah. Stop it! Pay attention.
Watching you. Watch the presentation, please!
translation.zh: ‎看着你们呢 请注意看展示！

translation.en: You know, I've gotta say that after 20 years
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我要说 经过20年

translation.en: of cleaning plastic out of the ocean, fertilizing arid land,
translation.zh:
‎把塑料从海洋中去除
‎营养化干旱土地

translation.en: repopulating endangered species…
You're welcome, by the way.
…I had a revelation.
Pollution.
Deforestation.
Hunting species to extinction.
So, who does all of that?
You do.
That's right.
You people can't solve the planet's problem
translation.zh: ‎你们人类解决不了这个星球的问题

translation.en: because the planet's problem is people.
translation.zh: ‎因为这个星球的问题就是人类

translation.en: So, whose fault is it, really,
that the world is on the brink of destruction?
translation.zh: ‎世界在毁灭的边缘 那是谁的错？

translation.en: It's my fault.
I expected too much of you.
I mean, you're only human.
You've done all you can. You really have.
But I haven't.
So I started thinking.
If I had a magic lamp, what would I wish for?
translation.zh: ‎如果我有神灯 我会许什么愿？

translation.en: Well, clean up the environment,
end climate change,
bring about world peace?
No, come on.
No, there's no way
that you can achieve all of that in one fell swoop.
Is there?
Well, there wasn't.
Until now.
Friends, humans, Earth people,
I give you the Monkhouse Dynamics Genie Orb!
translation.zh:
‎我向你们展示蒙克豪斯动力公司
‎精灵飞球！

translation.en: Here they come.
Little cheeky.
"Why genie?" I hear you ask.
translation.zh: ‎我听到你们问：“为什么是精灵？”

translation.en: Well, because our wish is their command.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们的愿望就是他们的命令

translation.en: You want to put a stop to climate change? Done.
translation.zh: ‎你们想终结气候变化？完成了

translation.en: You want to clean up the planet? No problem.
You want to bring about world peace?
Oh, go on then.
Now, I know what you're all thinking.
translation.zh: ‎现在 我知道你们都在想什么

translation.en: "How could these little things do all of that, Dalton?"
translation.zh:
‎“这些小东西
‎怎么能做到那些呢 道尔顿？”

translation.en: And the answer is, with your help.
translation.zh: ‎答案是 在你们的帮助之下

translation.en: Now, I need you to do something for me, okay?
translation.zh: ‎现在 我需要你们为我做点事 好吗？

translation.en: All I need you to do is just…
look into the light.
That's it.
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Just let it in.
Let it wash over you.
That warm, healing glow. Just let it in.
translation.zh: ‎那种温暖、治愈的光芒 让它进入

translation.en: Just look into the light.
That's it.
Nas!
What was that?
That was you interrupting what might have been the first meaningful contact
translation.zh:
‎是你打扰了
‎可能是人类与机器第一次

translation.en: between man and machine.
Oh. Sorry.
It was incredible.
Like it was reaching out to me somehow.
A connection.
[Monkhouse hologram] Hear the sound of my voice.
Just look into the light.
Trust me,
and believe me when I say
that I am sending you all
to a better place.
